title: remake during promo = loose free win from previously having won promos for that division?
body:
Last night I qualified for my promo's into S3, getting a free win as I have been S3 before. First match in promo ended up being a remake by the other team, lost the next then won the following. I assumed having had won one game + free win, the promo series would have been successful and I would have moved to S3. However the promo series is sitting at 1 win / 1 loss atm.

Is this intended?

replies.body: Thanks Wuks. I won the match and thus the promo series none the less (but it would have been pretty crap not to considering I won a game and should have had a free win), though by if it wasn't for the vanishing free win I should be up a win LP wise.
Ah, it's great to hear that you promo'd. Congrats! If you ever have this issue again, don't hesitate to reach out!
Not sure, but I'd imagine not. I can ask around and get back to you.
